channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bitcoin blows past $120,000 for first time as BlackRock ETF investors pile in
item.description: The asset management giant saw an influx of $2.4 billion into its crypto investment products last week.

item.title: Biden Says He Made the Clemency Decisions Recorded With Autopen
item.description: Donald J. Trump and his allies have begun investigations to support their claims that Joseph R. Biden Jr. was incapacitated and his staff conspired to...

item.title: EU warns Italy over meddling in UniCredit’s Banco BPM takeover
item.description: In a legal move that sets up a power struggle between Brussels and Rome, EU officials accused Italy's government of potentially violating EU law in im...

item.title: In His Own Words: How Trump Changed His Tone on Putin and the War in Ukraine
item.description: After years of lavishing praise on the Russian leader, President Trump abruptly changed his posture amid mounting frustration with the lack of progres...

item.title: The unlikely rise of Karyn Tomlinson, who traveled to France in her 20s to learn how to cook and just won the culinary world’s most prestigious award
item.description: At age 32, she moved to northern Sweden to apprentice at a mythic institution with 2 Michelin stars.

item.title: I’m leading the largest global law firm as AI transforms the legal profession. Lawyers must double down on this one skill
item.description: AI can handle the mechanics of law, but what makes a lawyer indispensable goes further than processing power.

item.title: It’s No Bluff: The Tariff Rate Is Soaring Under Trump
item.description: The president has earned a reputation for bluffing on tariffs. But he has steadily and dramatically raised U.S. tariffs, transforming global trade.

item.title: Stocks Shrug Off Trump’s Latest Tariff Threats
item.description: Analysts said the muted market response was because many investors expected the levies to settle at lower levels after negotiations.

item.title: Trump Reluctantly Comes Around to Backing Ukraine. Will He Stick With It?
item.description: President Trump is expected this week to formalize a new plan to sell American weapons to European allies, who would pass them onto Kyiv.

item.title: A new way to eat: How to fix a food system that leaves us vulnerable and hurts the environment
item.description: Sustainability can be baked into our food system from seed to shelf, as the Big Food Redesign Challenge demonstrates.

item.title: Zelensky Announces Plan for Major Government Shake-Up in Ukraine
item.description: An announcement by the Ukrainian president that he will seek to replace the prime minister with a loyalist came as the country faces battlefield setba...

item.title: Trump Reluctantly Comes Around to Backing Ukraine. Will He Stick With It?
item.description: President Trump is expected this week to formalize a new plan to sell American weapons to European allies, who would pass them onto Kyiv.

item.title: Plan to Indefinitely Displace Palestinians Threatens to Derail Gaza Truce
item.description: An Israeli proposal to force much of Gaza’s population into a small enclave is now overshadowing negotiations over a truce.
